summary: The comment section is highly polarized with a strong presence of nationalism and religious sentiment. There is a significant amount of toxicity, with many comments expressing anger and sarcasm towards India and its leadership. The discussion revolves around the India-Pakistan conflict, military technology, and international relations, with frequent mentions of national and religious identities. The controversy score is high, indicating a heated and divisive discussion.
title: Pakistan Just Humiliated India on the World Stage
